name: Song Anh Indochina Studios Nguyen Thai Binh
address: 165/47 Nguyễn Thái Bình, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
description:
Là chỗ nghỉ có quầy bar, Wi-Fi miễn phí và nhìn ra thành phố, Song Anh Indochina Studios Nguyen Thai Binh nằm tại vị trí thuận tiện ở TP. Hồ Chí Minh, cách Bảo tàng Mỹ thuật, Trung tâm mua sắm Takashimaya Việt Nam và Chợ Bến Thành một đoạn ngắn.

Được thiết kế với sân hiên, các căn có điều hòa, TV màn hình phẳng, cùng phòng tắm riêng gồm vòi sen và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí. Để thuận tiện hơn cho khách, chỗ nghỉ có thể cung cấp khăn tắm và khăn trải giường với khoản phụ phí.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần homestay bao gồm Công viên Tao Đàn, Bến cảng Nhà Rồng và Bảo tàng Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Tân Sơn Nhất, cách Song Anh Indochina Studios Nguyen Thai Binh 7 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Hiên
review.comment_positive: The hospitality, the location, the room with a terrass, the quietness and the backry

review.rating: Beautifully furnished studio in great location.
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Beautifully furnished room, super comfy bed, central location but on a quiet, residential street. We’d recommend pastries from downstairs, a beer from the taproom next door and dinner from the restaurant opposite!
review.comment_negative: Nothing, the best accommodation we had in Vietnam!

review.rating: Brilliant place to stay.   Will definitely be back
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Hiên
review.comment_positive: If you're not a party person, want privacy but want to be near the most bustling areas then this is it.   Great location, rooms were awesome, staff were great and the added bonus of a fantastic Cafe downstairs.  Rooms were clean and fantastic.  Brilliant place to stay. This place well exceeded my expectations.    Will definitively be back!

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
I loved the room at level 4 and also the position. 
The staff was really kind and they also have a coffee shop on ground floor with really great croissants!
review.comment_negative:
To go to your room after 7:00 pm you will have to open the shop gate. 
Also the rooms are quite expensive compared with the market price

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The owner is super lovely and very helpful, the location is amazing and the decoration of the room is beautiful! A surprise bonus was having a washer in the room. There is also a great little rooftop terrace

review.rating: A delightful stay in a clean, comfortable, inviting place.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The studio is in a great location, in the heart of District 1, the historical district, on a quiet side street.  The studio is clean, well appointed and very comfortable, including a deck and a washing machine.  It is in a building above a lovely café which is run by the owner of the studio.  The café is available for meals, and the friendly staff delivers breakfast and coffee to the studio upon request.  Access to the studio is through the café, which was fun.  The studio also has access to a great rooftop deck.  The owner was vey helpful, communicative and always friendly.   This is truly a gem.
review.comment_negative: The only negative I can think of is that the hot water in the shower was a bit difficult to control.  But we eventually got the hang of it.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Hiên
review.comment_positive: Oasis in the middle of HCM city. Good city location, lovely room and a very nice sitting area on the roof. Helpful staff - very kindly kept our bags overnight as we went cycling in the Mekong.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The hotel has a cozy Cafe were you can get very nice things to eat and drink. 
Super friendly and helpful owner and staff.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Hiên
review.comment_positive: Lovely apartment wonderful staff would highly recommend.

review.rating: We would love to stay there again.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Perfect place not only for relax but also for work.
Spacious room with full accomodity, lovely, tastefull design.
As a bonus you get cozy cafe and rooftop.

Great location with lots of food spots around, close to city center.
We were trying to stay there again in our way back, no suprise to place is fully booked :)
review.comment_negative: Nothing, it's perfect place to stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Hiên
review.comment_positive: The hospitality, the location, the room with a terrass, the quietness and the backry

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
I loved the room at level 4 and also the position. 
The staff was really kind and they also have a coffee shop on ground floor with really great croissants!
review.comment_negative:
To go to your room after 7:00 pm you will have to open the shop gate. 
Also the rooms are quite expensive compared with the market price

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The owner is super lovely and very helpful, the location is amazing and the decoration of the room is beautiful! A surprise bonus was having a washer in the room. There is also a great little rooftop terrace

review.rating: A delightful stay in a clean, comfortable, inviting place.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The studio is in a great location, in the heart of District 1, the historical district, on a quiet side street.  The studio is clean, well appointed and very comfortable, including a deck and a washing machine.  It is in a building above a lovely café which is run by the owner of the studio.  The café is available for meals, and the friendly staff delivers breakfast and coffee to the studio upon request.  Access to the studio is through the café, which was fun.  The studio also has access to a great rooftop deck.  The owner was vey helpful, communicative and always friendly.   This is truly a gem.
review.comment_negative: The only negative I can think of is that the hot water in the shower was a bit difficult to control.  But we eventually got the hang of it.
